name: Aiken Pilot Training
about: Aiken Pilot Training is a premier flight training institution located in Aiken, South Carolina, offering FAA Part 61 Flight Training. Our program is designed to accommodate your schedule and learning pace, ensuring a flexible and personalized training experience. With a team of professional instructors and a comprehensive curriculum, we provide high-quality training tailored to meet the individual needs of each student. Our facility at the Aiken Municipal Airport (KAIK) is equipped with modern amenities and a supportive learning environment. We are committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals with safety, efficiency, and excellence. At Aiken Pilot Training, we strive to make your journey to becoming a licensed pilot both enjoyable and successful.
